author: By ANDREW TAYLOR, LISA MASCARO and JONATHAN LEMIRE Associated Press
title: White House, Congress agree on $2 trillion virus rescue bill
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — The White House and Senate leaders of both major political parties announced agreement early Wednesday on unprecedented emergency legislation to rush sweeping aid to businesses, workers and a health care system slammed by the coronavirus pan…
